TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit AddressHeader extends System.Object

remarks.para: An is characterized by a name and namespace and has a value that contains optional information used to identify or interact with an endpoint. The name can be accessed by the property and the namespace by the property.

summary.para: Represents a header that encapsulates an address information item used to identify or interact with an endpoint.

remarks.para: Checks for equivalence of serialized canonical XML between the information items.

summary.para: Determines whether the information item in a specified object is equal to the object contained in the current address header.

returns.para: true if the information item in a specified is equivalent to the information item contained in the current address header; otherwise, false. In particular, returns false if is null.

Docs.param: The to compare with the object contained in the current address header.
